projects.title: Project One
projects.description: A full-stack web application built with modern technologies.
projects.longDescription: This project demonstrates building a scalable web application using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. It features real-time updates, authentication, and a responsive design.

projects.title: Project Two
projects.description: A CLI tool for automating development workflows.
projects.longDescription: A command-line tool built with Go that streamlines common development tasks including code generation, testing, and deployment.

projects.title: Project Three
projects.description: An open-source component library for React applications.
projects.longDescription: A collection of accessible, customizable React components built with TypeScript and styled with Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Project Four
projects.longDescription: An e-commerce solution with a focus on mobile experience, featuring fast checkout, real-time inventory, and seamless payments.

projects.title: Project Five
projects.description: A data visualization dashboard for analytics.
projects.longDescription: An interactive dashboard that visualizes complex data sets with charts, graphs, and real-time updates.
